item.title: Keep It Green
item.dc:creator: vonhan
item.description: We love greenery at Grace and Thorn, combining plants and flowers in our work whenever possible. ‘Keep it Green’ utilises foliage and greenery to play with tones and textures, creating a green statement, perfect for the alternative bouquet. The signature of a Fiore bouquet is that no two bouquets are ever the same so each and every bouquet is bespoke and truly unique. The picture shows an example of our bouquet with yours containing seasonal flowers similar in colour, texture and vibrancy – check out our Instagram feed for examples of our work! www.mcqueensflowers.com www.graceandthorn.com
item.content:encoded:
We love greenery at Grace and Thorn, combining plants and flowers in our work whenever possible. ‘Keep it Green’ utilises foliage and greenery to play with tones and textures, creating a green statement, perfect for the alternative bouquet.

The signature of a Fiore bouquet is that no two bouquets are ever the same so each and every bouquet is bespoke and truly unique. The picture shows an example of our bouquet with yours containing seasonal flowers similar in colour, texture and vibrancy – check out our Instagram feed for examples of our work!

www.mcqueensflowers.com

www.graceandthorn.com

item.title: Grace
item.dc:creator: vonhan
item.description: Behold – the timeless elegance of magnificent white Avalanche roses and dainty camomille, weaving throughout. Grace’s simple beauty has cemented its place as a McQueens Flowers classic. Please note – the bouquet pictured represents a medium size. Whilst we make every effort to source the exact ingredients, occasionally it may be necessary for our florists to substitute with a similar stem. www.mcqueensflowers.com
item.content:encoded:
Behold – the timeless elegance of magnificent white Avalanche roses and dainty camomille, weaving throughout. Grace’s simple beauty has cemented its place as a McQueens Flowers classic.

Please note – the bouquet pictured represents a medium size. Whilst we make every effort to source the exact ingredients, occasionally it may be necessary for our florists to substitute with a similar stem.

www.mcqueensflowers.com

item.title: Bisous
item.dc:creator: vonhan
item.description: Tulips are always a good idea – especially en masse in deep and delicious berry shades. Sweet Bisous is a kiss in flower form! Please note – the bouquet pictured represents a medium size. Whilst we make every effort to source the exact ingredients, occasionally it may be necessary for our florists to substitute with a similar stem. www.mcqueensflowers.com
item.content:encoded:
Tulips are always a good idea – especially en masse in deep and delicious berry shades. Sweet Bisous is a kiss in flower form!

Please note – the bouquet pictured represents a medium size. Whilst we make every effort to source the exact ingredients, occasionally it may be necessary for our florists to substitute with a similar stem.

www.mcqueensflowers.com
